roleset.name: send away, expel
roleset.note: BANISH-V NOTES: I have an intuition about a destination arg also;"banish to thehinterlands". (from banish.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The whole idea of computer-integrated manufacturing, CIM, seems to be making a comeback after losing a little luster over the past couple of years when it became apparent that it wasn't a panacea that [*T*-1] would make U.S. plants more efficient and banish foreign competition.

example.name: passive
example.text: Meanwhile, they tackle the mounds of paper -- and fantasize about a dream world where [bulk-mail postal regulations and government inspectors]*-1 are banished [*-1].

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: On the domestic front , the victory of Chen Shui - bian showed that people want more democracy , greater respect for human rights , and a more serious effort to banish " black gold " from the political arena .
